Docs.summary: Provides a call adapter class for the cHTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The cHTML call adapter renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.PhoneCall> control by using a "tel:" URL on a phone with telephony capability.

Docs.permission: for operating in a hosted environment. Demand value: ; Permission value: .
